title: The Lord of Reincarnation - Novel Updates
tags: Appearance Different from Actual Age   Body Tempering   Male Protagonist   Personality Changes   Reincarnation   Returning from Another World   Special Abilities   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Weak to Strong
author: The Plagiarist   Wen Chao Gong   文抄公
description: Death, is it the start of a new beginning? In the martial world of warriors, only the physical strong dominate and make up the invincible. In the world of immortal heroes, with a sword in the skilled hand, he is able to sever anything that falls on his path... This is the story of a traveler, in an endless world of reincarnation.>
